data.name: Hot Robot
data.detailed_description:
Silicone Skirmish!
Take out the enemy team with an assortment of sex toy firing weapons. Pick them off with the Butt-plug Sniper rifle, trip them up with the Anal Bead Bola-wrap Shooter, or slap them silly with a barrage of wiggly airborne dildos! All these weapons and more are in your arse-tickling arsenal. Use them to vibrate your way to victory.

P2P Multiplayer
Teams of up to four players face off in:

Team Deathmatch
Teams battle it out in a dildo-to-the-death free for all.

Capture the Flag
Capture the enemy "flag" to score!

Conquest
Stand your ground! Hold goal areas and fling dongs at whoever tries to blow up your spot.

Deathmatch
It's Every bot for themselves in this absolute dongslaught.

Rush
Plug a bomb into enemy regions.

Single Player
Play all the multiplayer games against AI enemy robots.

data.short_description: Strap yourself on for this First-Person Shooter with sex toy projectiles. Battle other dong-launching players in P2P multiplayer games like Rush, Team Deathmatch, and Conquest.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit version)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1600 or Intel i5-4440
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD RX 570 or Nvidia GTX 1050 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 35 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit version)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 3700X or Intel i7-9700k
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon RX 5700 XT or Nvidia RTX 2070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 45 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: Hot Robot takes place in a world where a super-intelligent AI unleashes an army of robots to make war on humankind using weapons and projectiles made from sex toys.  The story line will therefore be sexually explicit and contain adult themes that some players may find offensive.  All gameplay will involve combat with sex toy weapons and projectiles and should only be viewed by adults.  Players sensitive to nudity (robotic or otherwise) should avoid this game.
